channel.title: MusicFunction

item.title: MusicFunction
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Program new;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Procedure Music;

var
RM, RO, x1,x2,y1,y2 :Integer;
begin
RM :=Random(3)
Case random(40) of
0: Begin
Mmouse(857, 693,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(857, 693,3,3,true) end;
1: Begin
Mmouse(865, 692,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(865, 692,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;
2: Begin
Mmouse(855, 698,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(855, 698,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;
end;

x1 :=680;
x2 :=841;
y1 :=661;
y2 :=469;
If findcolorspiral(x,y,65280,x1,x2,y1,y2) then Begin
Mmouse(x,y,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(x,y,3+RM,3+RM,true)
end;

Case Random(60) of
0: Begin
Mmouse(754, 435,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(754, 435,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;

1: Begin
Mmouse(794, 432,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(794, 432,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;

2: Begin
Mmouse(837, 431,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(837, 431,3+RM,3+RM,true) End;
end;
End;

Procedure A;
begin
music;
end;

begin
A;
wait(1000)
end.

item.title: MusicFunction
item.dc:creator: @Akriam Akriam
item.description:
@Akriam wrote:

This is my first function so don’t be too harsh ;D

What it does:

Changes the music that is being played, and will sometimes changed it to loop or other options.

The Script:

I have NOT had a chance to test it yet, so I have no idea whether it works

[scar]
Function Music;
var RM, RO, x1,x2,y1,y2 :Integer
begin
RM :=Random(3)
Case random(40) of
0: Mouse(857, 693,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(857, 693,3+RM,3+RM,true)
1: Mouse(865, 692,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(865, 692,3+RM,3+RM,true)
2: Mouse(855, 698,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(855, 698,3+RM,3+RM,true)
then
x1 :=680
x2 :=841
y1 :=661
y2 :=469
If findcolorspiral(x,y,65280,3,3,x1,x2,y1,y2) then
Mmouse(x,y,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(x,y,3+RM,3+RM)
end;

begin
Case Random(60) of
0:Mmouse(754, 435,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(754, 435,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;

1:Mmouse(794, 432,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(794, 432,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;

2:Mmouse(837, 431,3+RM,3+RM)
Mouse(837, 431,3+RM,3+RM,true) end;
[/scar]
